sections.heading: Act, how cited.Sections 77-5001 to 77-5031 shall be known and may be cited as the Tax Equalization and Review Commission Act
77-5001 to 77-5031 shall be known and may be cited as the Tax Equalization and Review Commission Act.
sections.text: 77-5001 to 77-5031 shall be known and may be cited as the Tax Equalization and Review Commission Act.
